naming.locked_behavior: Greeting with 'Vanakkam' (palms together). Removal of shoes before entering homes.

protagonist.girl: Outfit: Cobalt Blue pavadai/sattai or skirt. Hair: long braid with jasmine (optional). Prop: Red Backpack.

characters.support: Elderly Tamil man. HAIR: Receding white hairline, simple silver-rimmed circular glasses. OUTFIT: Crisp white cotton Veshti (Dhoti) with a thin gold Zari border, cream (#FFFDD0) half-sleeve shirt. PROP: Wooden cane.

architecture.style: Tropical Dravidian architecture. Houses with vibrant ochre or pink compound walls.
architecture.threshold: Front entrance must feature a white 'Kolam' (geometric rice flour pattern) directly on the red-oxide or stone step.
architecture.horizon: Distant colorful temple Gopuram on the skyline.

visual_identity.environment: Golden Hour lighting (5:00 PM), lush coconut palm trees, red soil paths, and terracotta pots.

clothing.men: Formal white Veshti (Dhoti) with Zari border; cream cotton shirts.
clothing.women: Kanchipuram Silk Saree with jasmine flowers (Malli-poo) in braided hair.
clothing.children: Cobalt Blue school uniforms; Red Backpacks.

locked: Tender coconut stall with green coconuts

negatives.emotion_guideline: Respectful, subtle reverence for elders; collective neighborhood joy.
